name: R4B-DomainResource-R5-DomainResource
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B DomainResource into FHIR R5

element.display: A resource with narrative, extensions, and contained resources

target.display: A resource with narrative, extensions, and contained resources
target.comment: R4B `DomainResource` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DomainResource`
R4B `DomainResource.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DomainResource.contained`
R4B `DomainResource.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DomainResource.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DomainResource.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DomainResource.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `DomainResource.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DomainResource.implicitRules`
R4B `DomainResource.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DomainResource.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `DomainResource.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DomainResource.meta`

R4B `DomainResource.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DomainResource.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `DomainResource.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DomainResource.text`
